articles.title: Real-time intelligence: How India’s Swiggy serves millions with Microsoft Fabric
articles.author: stclarke

articles.title: It was fun to spend time with the team at Swiggy today, and see how they’re using Microsoft Fabric to process billions of data points in near real time, paving the way for new innovations in how convenience is delivered to millions of their users. A really great use case!
